original_title: US realistic about chances of Ukraine peace – Trump aide — RT World News
article_summary: Russian authorities have dismantled a Western-trained Ukrainian sabotage group planning terrorist attacks on Russian transport infrastructure in the Bryansk Region. Three group members were killed, and three others, including the commander, were captured. The group was reportedly supervised by Ukraine's military intelligence and trained with the involvement of Western intelligence officers from Lithuania, Estonia, Norway, the UK, and Canada. Seized items included weapons, explosives, and a communication device. The arrested men confessed to previous attacks on Russian railway tracks and preparations for further attacks. A criminal case has been opened, and investigations launched under relevant articles of the criminal code.</s>
